title: Survey notification templates
content:
Service Management sends surveys to users based on a notification template. When you send a survey manually by using the Send survey now button from a survey record or when you create a business rule for the system to automatically send a survey, you need to specify a survey notification template.

Define survey notification templates

Service Management has pre-defined survey notification templates. To access these templates:

  1. Log in to the agent interface as the tenant admin.
  2. Navigate to Administration > Studio, and open the Survey record type.
  3. Click the Notifications tab. Out of the box, this tab displays a list of pre-defined survey templates.

If you like, you can customize these templates or create your own templates. For details, see Work with notification templates. 

Specify a survey notification template

When you sending a manual survey or create a "Survey notification" business rule, you need to specify a survey notification template. You can select Survey default template or a custom template if available.

When creating a survey notification business rule

Survey default template

If you select Survey default template, Service Management uses one of the out-of-the-box templates according to the content of the specified survey. Two attributes of a survey determine which template to be used for sending the survey:

  • Whether the survey has a question of the Primary survey rating answer type
  • Whether the survey has a record type defined in the Report fields section

The following table explains which default template is applicable to a survey. 

Template Used as the default template for surveys that meet all of the following conditions
Survey with primary rating question default template
  • Have a question of the Primary survey rating answer type
  • Have no record type defined in the Report fields section
Survey with record and primary rating question default template
  • Have a question of the Primary survey rating answer type
  • Have a record type defined in the Report fields section
Survey with record default template
  • Have no question of the Primary survey rating answer type
  • Have a record type defined in the Report fields section
Survey without record default template
  • Have no question of the Primary survey rating answer type
  • Have no record type defined in the Report fields section

Custom template

If you specify a custom template, Service Management sends the survey based on that template. For example, if you've defined a custom template for the Request record type, and created a business rule for Request based on the custom template, Service Management sends the survey based on that template when a request meets the condition of the business rule.
